    • Constructor Detail

      • RadialSort

        public RadialSort(long interObjectDelay,
                  boolean reversed,
                  RadialSort.Position position)
        Establishes the delay between object animations and their starting position based on distance, delay, and a value from the Position enum
        Parameters:
        interObjectDelay - delay between object animations
        reversed - flag to indicate if the animation should be reversed
        position - enum value of the position the animation should start from

        Get the point that's closest to the start point
        children - List of views to sort by distance
        Returns:
        PointF of the distance between a point and 0, 0
